application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 21/04271/RE4 as amended by 24/03469/NMA: Site Wide Phasing Strategy (54) in respect of non material amendment to ref: 21/04271/RE4 comprising removal of the Beck House slab and associated ground works on Upton Road and construction of 134 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) and up to 188sqm flexible commercial floorspace (Use Class E) comprising buildings up to 7 storeys in height, and the change of use of ancillary garages to part of lower ground floor of Scott House (Use Class C3) to provide up to 70sqm community hall (Use Class F2(b)), 45sqm ancillary management office (Use Class C3), podium deck, along with associated means of access and highways works; car and cycle parking; hard and soft landscaping; play space and public, communal, and private realm; refuse storage; ancillary plant and structures; and works to Scott House to create new access at lower ground and ground floor levels.
